(1,): As a system administrator, I want to manage user accounts with different roles, so that access control can be properly enforced As a UI designer, I want to schedule user testing sessions, so that interface improvements can be validated As a tester, I want to report UI issues with components, so that bugs can be tracked and fixed As a UI designer, I want to generate testing reports, so that I can analyze test results As a system, I want to maintain submission timestamps (created/updated), so that activity can be audited
(2,): As a broker user, I want to create new submissions (FABS/DABS), so that I can submit financial data for processing As a broker user, I want to publish my submission, so that the data can be processed and made available As a developer, I want to cache D files, so that frequently accessed data can be retrieved quickly As a broker user, I want to track errors and warnings on my submissions, so that I can address problems
(0,): As a system, I want to track submission status (draft/published/failed), so that users can understand the state of their submissions As a system, I want to validate DABS submissions for required fields like DUNS number, so that data quality is maintained As a system, I want to automatically derive FABS-specific fields like FundingAgencyCode, so that submissions are properly enriched
(3,): As a data analyst, I want to set GTAS window periods, so that data processing can be time-bound As a data engineer, I want to load historical FABS data with derived fields, so that legacy data can be processed consistently As a data engineer, I want to load FPDS data with historical records filter, so that I can control which data is processed
